# Laravel 12 English Exam Simulator - Project Setup

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
	Project: Laravel 12 English Exam Simulator with Vue.js 3 frontend
	Backend: Laravel 12 API with MySQL
	Frontend: Vue.js 3 + Vite + Tailwind CSS
	Auth: Laravel Sanctum

- [ ] Scaffold the Project
	Create Laravel 12 project structure with Vue.js frontend

- [ ] Customize the Project
	- Create 8 database migrations
	- Create Eloquent models with relationships
	- Create API controllers and routes
	- Create Vue.js components and pages
	- Seed 80 questions across 3 levels

- [ ] Install Required Extensions
	No additional extensions required

- [ ] Compile the Project
	Install dependencies and build assets

- [ ] Create and Run Task
	Create tasks for Laravel serve and Vite dev server

- [ ] Launch the Project
	Run Laravel server and Vite

- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	Create README.md with setup instructions
